content: As some of you know, Atlanta made me feel like I've found my tribe in healthcare ... contrary to the worries of some (hello @Virginia Lorenzi ) who thought I'd be overwhelmed by the nerdiness and deep-in-the-weeds. I love weeds ... weeds are where the mischief and mystery is! Master the weeds and you might own the future.
Welcome to our special place. We're glad to have and look forward to seeing what kind of mischief we can get into together :)

Well, I'm serious - being with you-all for 5 days was like no other experience I've had in a long long time.

I can't remember a "business" event where I've woken up, the first morning back home, MISSING the meeting I was just at. That ain't normal. :slight_smile:
